h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Macaque Chief (First Encounter)
content: These formidable foes are pretty beefy, and use their wicked weapons to throw at you like boomerangs from a distance. They can also string long combo attacks together, requiring you to interrupt one with a Rock Solid deflection or wait until their final leaping slash or delayed uppercut to retaliate.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Snowhill_Path_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Snowhill Path Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Frost-Clad Path' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Macaque Chief (First Encounter)'.
The content is as follows:
These formidable foes are pretty beefy, and use their wicked weapons to throw at you like boomerangs from a distance. They can also string long combo attacks together, requiring you to interrupt one with a Rock Solid deflection or wait until their final leaping slash or delayed uppercut to retaliate.
